channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins CRX Content Package Deployer Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins CRX Content Package Deployer Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34184|2024-08-03T08:16:17.198Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20crx%20content%20package%20deployer%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins CRX Content Package Deployer Plugin 1.9 and earlier does not escape the name and description of CRX Content Package Choice parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.
